    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer(int type,
                int arrivalTimeHour,
                int arrivalTimeMinute,
                int transactionTime)
        Creates Customer using given parameter
        Parameters:
        type - Type of customer this value can't be bigger than 3 and lesser than 1
        arrivalTimeHour - Arrival hour of Customer this value can't be bigger than 24 or lesser than 0
        arrivalTimeMinute - Arrival minute of Customer this value can't be bigger than 60 or lesser than 0
        transactionTime - Transaction time of customer this value have to be bigger than 0. and this value is minute type

        No parameter constructor Assigns all values to -1
